title: "Metodo newton raphson"
output:
  html_notebook: default
  pdf_document: default
---

```{r}
f <- function (x) {
  return (exp(x) - pi*x)
}

fprima <- function(x){
  return (exp(x) - pi)
} 

newtonR <- function(x){

  E <- 1
  error <- 1e-5
  x1<-0 
  
  while(error < E){
    
    x1 <- x - f(x)/fprima(x)
    E <- abs(x1-x)/abs(x1)
    x <- x1
    
  }
  E <<- E
  
  return(x)
  
}

cat("Primera raiz: ", newtonR(1), "\nError: ", E)

cat("\nSegunda raiz: ", newtonR(2), "\nError: ", E)

```

plot(f)
